class.name: JSON
class.brief_description: Helper class for parsing JSON data.
class.description: Helper class for parsing JSON data. For usage example, see [JSONParseResult].

method.name: parse
method.description: Parses a JSON encoded string and returns a [JSONParseResult] containing the result.

method.name: print
method.description: Converts a Variant var to JSON text and returns the result. Useful for serializing data to store or send over the network.
